conbody.p:
You can edit the environment file, sdc-env.sh, to add Java configuration options. The environment configuration file includes the following Java configuration options:
SDC_PRE_CLASSPATH Defines the path to Java classes that you can use in custom stages such as the JavaScript or Jython Evaluator. asking Brock the difference.
SDC_POST_CLASSPATH Defines the path to Java classes that you can call from custom stages such as the JavaScript or Jython Evaluator.
SDC_JAVA_OPTS Defines additional Java configuration options that you want the to use. By default, this property includes the heap size for the .
